Interface SelectQuery

All Superinterfaces:
ConditionProvider, FieldLike, FieldProvider, OrderProvider, Query, QueryPartProvider, Select<Record>, java.io.Serializable, TableLike<Record>
public interface SelectQuery
extends Select<Record>, ConditionProvider, OrderProvider

A query for data selection

Lukas Eder
